preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 30 g of Germanium. 
 2. Weigh out 60 g of Silicon. 
 3. Weigh out 20 g of Strontium. 
 4. Weigh out 45 g of Zinc. 
 5. In a clean, dry mixing container, combine all the weighed materials thoroughly using a spatula or mixer until a uniform blend is achieved.
